edge: The Filmfare Awards ceremony held on March 27, 2021 recognized Dharma Productions and Zee Studios for their contribution to the Best Film category. This award is a prestigious recognition in the Indian film industry.
The Filmfare Awards also honored Sharan Sharma with the Best Director title during their ceremony on March 27, 2021.
Janhvi Kapoor was recognized as the Best Actress at the Filmfare Awards ceremony held on March 27, 2021.
Pankaj Tripathi received the Best Supporting Actor award at the Filmfare Awards ceremony held on March 27, 2021.
Palak Muchhal won the Best Female Playback Singer award for her song 'Mann Ki Dori' at the Filmfare Awards ceremony held on March 27, 2021.
During the Filmfare Awards ceremony held on March 27, 2021, Aditya Kanwar received the Best Production Design award for his contributions to the event.
The Filmfare Awards ceremony held on March 27, 2021 recognized Ali Merchant's efforts as the Best Sound Designer for his contributions to the event.
Jayesh Vaishnav received the Best Special Effects award at the Filmfare Awards ceremony held on March 27, 2021.
The production company Dharma Productions was recognized as a significant contributor to the Best Film category at the Filmfare Awards ceremony held on March 27, 2021.
The film production studio Zee Studios was also awarded for its contribution to the Best Film category at the Filmfare Awards ceremony held on March 27, 2021.
